He is Executive Chairman: As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin .

Zahi Hawass , secretary general of Egypt"s Supreme Council on Antiquities, said Sunday that nothing is stolen from the Cairo museum. Speaking by phone from Cairo, Zahi Hawass said that a few items were broken- including a statue of King Tutankhamun riding a jaguar- after looters smashed windows on the roof of the Museum of Egyptian Antiquities

The redesigned 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan have been driving off the assembly line for several weeks, and the vehicles are selling well, Sergio Marchionne has said. I think whenever we launch new products coming out of these plants, we need to be there, said Sergio Marchionne last Wednesday during the North American International Auto Show in Detroit. "I think it's an important recognition of the effort that's gone in here by our colleagues on the shop floor."
